thread.title: Politics: Meru Governor Aspirant Kilemi Mwiria ditches Jubilee Party
thread.title_full: Politics: Meru Governor Aspirant Kilemi Mwiria ditches Jubilee Party

title: Politics: Meru Governor Aspirant Kilemi Mwiria ditches Jubilee Party
text:
Your are here » Home » Politics Meru Governor Aspirant Kilemi Mwiria ditches Jubilee Party By Mercy Asamba | Updated Thu, February 2nd 2017 at 12:36 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter Former advisor of President Uhuru on education, Kilemi Mwiria defects from Jubilee Party and joins Alfred Mutua's Maendeleo Chap Chap Party. (Photo: Courtesy) 
Meru Governor Aspirant and former advisor of President Uhuru on education, Kilemi Mwiria defects from Jubilee Party and joins Alfred Mutua's Maendeleo Chap Chap Party. 
"I am coming to a party that is not only friendly but also development conscious," said Kilemi Mwaura. 
“I am Impressed in the structure of the political party that is more resource oriented,” He added. 
He urged Meru residents to support him. 
Maendeleo Party leader Alfred Mutua has been receiving defectors from other parties. WATCH THIS
